title: Bill Caswell (Legend of rally and crazy builds)
description: This week we sat down with Bill Caswell and Wyatt Knox of crazy Mexican BMW rally car fame, also we talk about New Hampshire and how to become a co-driver.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
content:encoded: This week we sat down with Bill Caswell and Wyatt Knox of crazy Mexican BMW rally car fame, also we talk about New Hampshire and how to become a co-driver.
